title: House for Sale
details:
A two story house built in 20.5 perch land with below facilities
4 Bed rooms and attached bathrooms
Large Hall and dining area
Large balcony
Kitchen and the Pantry Store room
Maid's room and the toilet
Separate entrance to the upstairs
Parking for 2/3 vehicles

20 ft wide access road,
quiet Neighborhood and highly residential ares
